name: Limits in EFS
title: Limits in EFS
body:
Overview

This article provides information about various limits in EFS (Enterprise Feedback Suite), including file size restrictions, question type limitations, and reporting constraints.

Information

EFS has several limitations in place for different features and functionalities. More will be added as we come across them.

Media Library

The Media Library in EFS has a global file size limit for uploads, in amount of 512MB. This is a global setting and cannot be changed.

Upload Question Type

The Upload question type has a specific file size limit for uploads.

The default maximum file size for the Upload question type is 64MB, and this refers to the max size allowed by customers to upload files in the survey.

However, the upload size limit for panelists can be adjusted via the survey_questiontype_upload_limitÂ variable.

Autocomplete Question Type

The Autocomplete question type (Question type 143) has a limit on the number of lines, namely 10000 lines.

Reporting+

Reporting+ has several limitations related to the number of reports, data records, and columns.

  • Standard: 3 reports per project (can be increased to 8-10 for a fee by Technical Support)

  • 50,000 data records (default)

  • Columns in split dimensions: 25 (columns, including the dimension column)

  • For the evaluation of loops, Technical Support must activate this beforehand

FAQ

Can the Media Library upload file size limit be changed?

No, the 512 MB limit for the Media Library is a global setting and cannot be changed.

Is it possible to increase the Upload question type file size limit?

Yes, Technical Support can increase the 8 MB limit for the Upload question type if needed.

How many reports are allowed per project in Reporting+?

By default, 3 reports are allowed per project. This can be increased to 8-10 for a fee by contacting Technical Support.

How can loop evaluation be enabled in Reporting+?

Loop evaluation in Reporting+ must be activated by Technical Support. Contact them to enable this feature.
